import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get all workflow statuses"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/workflows/statuses"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all ticket statuses across all workflows configured in the system. This provides a complete inventory of possible ticket states, useful for building universal status dropdowns, cross-workflow reporting, or understanding the full range of ticket lifecycle states.

**Workflow Example**
1. List all statuses: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/workflows/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/get-all-workflow-statuses)
2. Use for UI: Populate status filter dropdowns that work across all ticket types
3. Use for reporting: Build dashboards that aggregate tickets by status across workflows

**Response Fields**: Each status includes `WorkflowStepId`, `WorkflowId`, `StepName`, `Color`, `IsClosed`, and `DisplayOrder`.

**Use Cases**: Building cross-workflow status filters, creating universal ticket dashboards, analyzing ticket distribution across all workflow states.

**Note**: For workflow-specific statuses, use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{workflowId\}/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/get-workflow-statuses) instead.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{workflowId\}/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/get-workflow-statuses) – Statuses for specific workflow
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/statuses/\{statusId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-status-by-id) – Single status details
- [GET /api/v1.0/workflows](/docs/api/workflows/list-workflows) – List available workflows
